    static void sumArray​(int[] array1, int[] arrayToAdd_isTemp)
    adds the arrayToAdd_isTemp to array1, ignoring if the arrayToAdd_isTemp is longer.
    static int TypeOfResourceToInt​(TypeOfResource type)
    method that convert a type of resource to an int (that is used as an index for vectors). it uses the usual alphabetical distribution for coins through stones, starting from 0 to 3. it returns -1 if the resource is faith

      method that generates a GameStatusUpdate in a json file.
      Parameters:
      match - match from witch a GameStatusUpdate is generated
      filePath - path of the file that will be generated
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if the file cannot be created

      Parameters:

    • TypeOfResourceToInt

      public static int TypeOfResourceToInt​(TypeOfResource type)
      method that convert a type of resource to an int (that is used as an index for vectors). it uses the usual alphabetical distribution for coins through stones, starting from 0 to 3. it returns -1 if the resource is faith
      Parameters:
      type -
      Returns:

    • IntToTypeOfResource

      public static TypeOfResource IntToTypeOfResource​(int idResource)
      method that convert the resourceID to the resource enum
      Parameters:
      idResource - id of resource, standard order from 0 to 4
      Returns:
      resource enum corresponding to the resource id

    • isItAffordable

      public static boolean isItAffordable​(int[] cost, int[] maxPayment)
      method that values if the second array is bigger than the first(for it to be bigger all his instances must be greater than the other)
      Parameters:
      cost - first array
      maxPayment - second array, the one that is valued
      Returns:
      false if any maxPayment[i] is smaller than cost[i], true otherwise

    • AreAnyTrue

      public static boolean AreAnyTrue​(boolean[] toBeChecked)
      method that checks if any entry on this boolean vector is true
      Parameters:
      toBeChecked - boolean vector to be checked
      Returns:
      false if all entries on the vector are false, true otherwise

    • numBetween1and4

      public static boolean numBetween1and4​(int n)
      method that checks if a number corresponds to a resource
      Parameters:
      n - number checked
      Returns:
      true if num between 1 and 4, false otherwise

    • sumArray

      public static void sumArray​(int[] array1, int[] arrayToAdd_isTemp)
      adds the arrayToAdd_isTemp to array1, ignoring if the arrayToAdd_isTemp is longer. Will throw a NullPointerException if the arrayToAdd_isTemp is shorter than array1
      Parameters:
      array1 - array where the second one is added to (this DOES INCREASE)
      arrayToAdd_isTemp - array which is added to the first one (this DOES NOT INCREASE)

    • areAllTrue

      public static boolean areAllTrue​(boolean[] toBeChecked)
      checks if a boolean vector is all true
      Parameters:
      toBeChecked - vector checked
      Returns:
      true if the vector does not contain any false, true otherwise

    • productionNotAborted

      public static boolean productionNotAborted​(int[] array)
      controls that the client wants to take the production action
      Parameters:
      array - array to be checked
      Returns:
      true if at least one selection is changed, false otherwise
